column1: This workbook is a working template. Requirement summaries are intentionally brief and must be verified against MDR Annex I text. For each applicable requirement, provide a concise design solution summary and point to controlled evidence documents and test reports.
1) Freeze intended use/claim set and labeling.
3) For Applicable/Partial, document risk controls and evidence references.
4) Review consistency with Risk Management File and V&V evidence matrix.
